meanings.definition: In a manner that is extremely tiring or exhausting.
meanings.sent1: She worked gruelingly all day under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runner finished the race gruelingly, but with a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel tried gruelingly to reach the acorn at the top of the tree.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed was gruelingly evident in every step he took.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber ascended gruelingly, battling against the strong winds.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves great effort or hardship.
meanings.sent1: The students studied gruelingly for their final exams.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers toiled gruelingly to finish the building on time.
meanings.sent3: The chef gruelingly prepared the elaborate feast for the royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: Her journey to recovery was gruelingly long, but she never gave up.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted gruelingly, pouring all his emotions onto the canvas.
